channel.title: Training/Workshop on Minnesota Cryptocurrency
channel.description: Recent content in Training/Workshop on Minnesota Cryptocurrency

item.title: Make Your Own Cryptocurrency Coding Session
item.description:
Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, November 14, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Join us this Wednesday as we explore integrating transactions with our blockchain. We will be discussing inputs and outputs, transaction fees, miner’s rewards, and so much more! We have streamlined the development process to focus more on high-level topics, so make sure to attend even if you aren’t an expert coder!
When?Wednesday, November 14th at 7:00 PM

item.title: Battle for Privacy
item.description:
Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 16, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Privacy coins like Monero and Zcash feature cutting-edge applied cryptography. Privacy, fungibility, and security are important characteristics of money. Join us this Friday to learn more about these privacy coins and how they’re changing the game. We will also discuss the difficulty of developing privacy-focused systems and the best ways for assessing the quality of privacy technologies.
When? Friday, November 16th at 4:30 PM

item.title: Cryptocurrency Deep Dive - Privacy
Mining Workshop
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, September 28, 2018 Location: Robert Bruininks Hall 432 Join us this Friday in Bruininks Hall 432 at 4:30p to learn the basics of mining cryptocurrency.

item.title: Ethereum Solidity Coding Session
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, October 3, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Learn Ethereum and Solidity! You can use the programming language Solidity to create smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. Some previous experience with object-oriented programming is preferred but not required.

item.title: Bitcoin Forks
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, October 12, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Come to our meeting THIS Friday at 4:30p in Bruininks 432 to learn more about current and future Bitcoin forks!

item.title: Create Your Own Cryptocurrency!
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, October 17, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Create your own cryptocurrency today at our deep dive meeting! We will get into many mechanics if time permits, from start to the process of implementing mining! Find us at 7 PM in Bruininks Hall 123!

item.title: Crypto Scams
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 2, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 432 FREE CANE’S! Also, the growth of the blockchain and cryptocurrency ecosystem has been exciting. innovations have attracted quit a big crowd over the year, but this also includes a number of bad actors. Join us this Friday to discuss and learn about the scams that have happened in the past and how to avoid the current ones today. This space is a lot more enjoyable if you know how to navigate it!

item.title: Decentralized Storage
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, November 7, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Join us TODAY to take a deep dive into distributed storage methods. We will discuss the pros and cons (mostly cons) of storing information on distributed systems, and we will cover some workarounds and other solutions to facilitate the integration of information with these distributed systems. Previous blockchain knowledge suggested but not required. When? Today at 7:00 PM
